trends: There have been 55 other sightings in Ottawa
There was one other sighting in Ottawa on or around July 1st 2009
Summary: 2 huge grey blue balls of light with no sound witnessed by 5 people.
divs: sighting detailsi had just opened the front door and my 12 year old daughter said theres a ufo. i looked up and to my amazement, saw a huge blue gray ball of light it changes colors and there seemed to be fog around it. i went crazy i started to scream for the rest of my family to grab a camera and fast...of course every body ran out side to see what the screaming was, because i was just crazy with excitement , at that time my daughter told me there was another one before it, i ran to the street to see it... i was in awe...there was the same blue gray ball moving at the exact same speed...it was like they were attached to each other....they made no sound at all... these things were huge i have seen ufos in the past.. also with witnesses.to see something that big!! this was witnessed by 5 people including the neighbor. we are will to take a polygraph...i *(wit's name deleted--sgonzalez\cms) swear on the holy bible i am telling the truth...these things are real
